title: 820-00840 - does not charge - no liquid
message:
have this 820-00840 has no liquid damage whats so ever, no damage checked with microscope, cleanest board ive seen, computer works perfectly normal turns on and keeps running, tested with other entire computer all known to work, confirmed board issue.

but none of the usbC ports read any cord, should i replace both U3100 AND U 3200

or any experience of what else it could be?

title: 820-00840 - does not charge - no liquid
message:
"none of the usbC ports read any cord"
I do not exactly understand you...

USB-C meter stays in 5V?
Or machine doesn't detect USB devices?
